_header: Now to do well how shalt thou do
_description: ‘Do well & drede no man’ — two quatrains (abab) and 4-line burden: ‘Do well & drede no man / The best concell ys þat Y can’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Now to do well how shalt þu doHerken to me & y shall the
                    telle…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Thow hast by commaundementObserue thees to then doist þu
                    well
